original_title: Maids:Docile and Invisible, A Story on Domestic Worker
overview: In Asia, in the Middle East, and even in Europe, in the privacy of families that can act with impunity, over fifteen million housekeepers are victims of slavery: exploited at will, abused, and sometimes raped, these invisible women are the sacrificed workers of the global economy. States, institutions, middlemen... no one is interested in change, despite a smoldering spirit of revolt.
title: Maids:Docile and Invisible, A Story on Domestic Worker
